text: Adelospondylus is an extinct lepospondyl amphibian. Life reconstruction of Adelospondylus watsoni ==References== ==External links== 2D, stereoscopic, and 3D imagery of the type specimen of Adelospondylus watsoni Category:Adelospondyls Category:Carboniferous amphibians of Europe Category:Taxa named by Robert L. Carroll Category:Fossil taxa described in 1967
title: Adelospondylus
